v2.2.0 - Changelog
- Overhauled segmented Notification system to be centralized into one. - Bot will take a screenshot of its current position when it encounters an error and shuts itself down. - Fixed bug where bot got stuck on the No Loot screen when farming Raids. - Fixed bug where bot got stuck checking room codes when farming Raids. - Fixed bug where bot crashed due to Point objects being reset each run when farming Raids.
